title: Why banks are under the gun to beat mutual funds and emerge out of a big threat
description: The Indian banking sector is struggling to attract deposits due to competition from mutual funds offering higher returns. Regulatory restrictions limit banks' ability to provide attractive returns, leading to a shift in investor preferences. Banks are exploring new strategies to address this challenge and maintain stability.
